name: 2048 by Green Panda Games
description:
The famous 2048 is now on the Apple TV !

Play from your sofa and join the numbers to get to the 2048 tile!

HOW TO PLAY: Use your Apple Siri Remote to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!

The game 2048 is inspired by Gabriele Cirulli game available on the web: http://gabrielecirulli.github.io/2048/
